text: do I need Dash Enterprise to share a Dash app on a website?

elements.text: do I need Dash Enterprise to share a Dash app on a website?

text: Not necessarily. Dash Enterprise helps a lot by automating most of the steps, but you can containerise a Dash app yourself and run it for instance on Heroku, or any other container service you have access to.

elements.text: Not necessarily. Dash Enterprise helps a lot by automating most of the steps, but you can containerise a Dash app yourself and run it for instance on Heroku, or any other container service you have access to.

text: It just takes a bit of fiddling I understand.

elements.text: It just takes a bit of fiddling I understand.

text: See <https://dash-julia.plotly.com/deployment> for an example of how to deploy on Heroku.

attachments.title: Dash for Julia User Guide and Documentation | Plotly
attachments.text: Dash for Julia User Guide and Documentation. Dash is a framework for building analytical web apps in Julia, R, and Python.

elements.text: for an example of how to deploy on Heroku.
